name: Cabela's Big Game Hunter 2005 Adventures
description:
Cabela's Big Game Hunter 2005 Adventures is an action-sports game developed by Torus Games, Fun Labs and Magic Wand Productions. It came out on 01-09-2004. It was published by Activision Blizzard. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Cabela's Big Game Hunter 2005 Adventures on Xbox, Game Boy Advance, GameCube and PlayStation 2.
